summary: This bill, the HOME Investment Partnerships Reauthorization and Improvement Act of 2025, aims to reauthorize and reform the HOME Investment Partnerships Program. Key provisions include reauthorization of funding, increases in program administration resources, modifications to jurisdictional qualifications, and reforms to program administration and rules. The bill also addresses affordable housing qualifications, homeownership resale restrictions, home property inspections, enforcement mechanisms, and establishes a home loan guarantee program.
